DPRD DKI Tambah Anggaran Pembebasan Lahan untuk Waduk Jadi Rp 600 M
05 Nov 2019, 21:11 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Dinas Sumber Daya Air (SDA) DKI Jakarta mendapat usulan tambahan anggaran pembebasan lahan untuk pembuatan waduk. Anggaran yang tadinya Rp 425 miliar menjadi Rp 600 miliar.
"Pembebasan lahan jadi Rp 600 miliar buat tahun 2020 untuk waduk dan sungai, untuk semuanya total. Tadinya Rp 425 miliar ditambah jadi Rp 600 miliar. Itu sudah disepakati tadi sudah diketok. Karena masih banyak lokasi yang belum dibebaskan, Rp 425 miliar itu nggak cukup. Jadi ditambahin," ujar Kepala Dinas SDA DKI Juaini di gedung DPRD DKI, Jl Kebon Sirih, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Usulan itu diajukan oleh Komisi D DPRD DKI dalam rapat membahas Kebijakan Umum Anggaran-Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) 2020.
Juaini mengatakan nantinya akan ada 10 waduk yang akan dilakukan pembebasan lahan. Termasuk waduk di wilayah Pondok Ranggon, yang menjadi sorotan Wakil Ketua DPRD DKI M. Taufik.
"Itu jadi dari waduk yang itu sebenarnya sudah dibebasin, tinggal sisa-sisa pembebasan berapa bidang yang belum dibebasin. Ada sekitar 10 waduk penambahan. Kalau kali itu ada 4. Termasuk nanti Pondok Ranggon yang diminta Pak Taufik," katanya.


Kepala Dinas SDA DKI Juaini (Eva Safitri/detikcom)

Secara keseluruhan, Dinas SDA mendapat Rp 3,9 triliun untuk tahun 2020. Sisanya, direncanakan untuk penanggulangan banjir di DKI.
"Total keseluruhan SDA itu ada Rp 3,9 triliun, itu termasuk pembebasan lahan, pengendalian banjir, naturalisasi, di situ semua," kata Juaini.
Komisi D DPRD DKI saat ini sedang membahas anggaran terkait Kebijakan Umum Anggaran-Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) 2020. Anggaran yang diputuskan pun belum pasti. Setelah itu, KUA PPAS akan dibawa ke rapat Badan Anggaran DPRD DKI.

DKI DPRD Adds Land Acquisition Budget for Reserves to Be Rp. 600 Billion
05 Nov 2019, 21:11 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Water Resources (SDA) Office has received an additional proposal for land acquisition budget for reservoir construction. The budget which was from Rp 425 billion to Rp 600 billion.
"The land acquisition will be Rp. 600 billion for 2020 for reservoirs and rivers, for all of it in total. Previously Rp. 425 billion was added to Rp. 600 billion. It was agreed upon earlier that it has been determined. Because there are still many locations that have not been released, Rp. 425 billion is not enough So, add it, "said Head of the Juaini DKI SDA Service in the DKI DPRD building, Jl Kebon Sirih, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
The proposal was submitted by Commission D of the DKI DPRD in a meeting to discuss the 2020 Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) General Policy Budget.
Juaini said that in the future 10 reservoirs would be acquired. Including the reservoir in the Pondok Ranggon area, which was highlighted by the Deputy Chairman of the DKI DPRD M. Taufik.
"It was made from the reservoir that had actually been cleared, leaving only the remnants of the number of fields that had not yet been cleared. There were about 10 additional reservoirs. If there were 4. This includes Pondok Ranggon later requested by Mr. Taufik," he said.


Head of DKI Jakarta SDA Service (Eva Safitri / detikcom)

Overall, the SDA Office received Rp 3.9 trillion for 2020. The rest is planned for flood mitigation in DKI.
"The total SDA total is Rp. 3.9 trillion, including land acquisition, flood control, naturalization, all of it," said Juaini.
DKI Jakarta DPRD Commission D is currently discussing the budget related to the 2020 Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) General Policy. The budget that was decided was also uncertain. After that, KUA PPAS will be brought to the DKI DPRD Budget Board meeting.
